name: Pipe Inspector: Plumbocalypse
description:
He's ready to inspect your pipes.

A DVD-Video game. To play, download the iso file and burn it to a DVD disc; or play with a software DVD player (like VLC, Kodi etc.)

Made at PolyJam 2020 / Global Game Jam 2020
